title: Flipped Learning-Based Language Proficiency Improvement Program

context.additional_context: Learning progression via non-real-time LMS in digitally supported environments. Applies formative assessment-centered flipped learning models

learning_goals: Learners must master 80% or more of the pre-learning materials provided in the flipped learning model to actively participate in real-time discussions
Learners demonstrate a 20% or greater improvement in language proficiency achievement through weekly formative assessments
Learners increase their learning engagement by 30% or more through peer feedback and self-regulated assessment activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
